original_text: And Moses went into the midst of the cloud, and gat him up into the mount: and Moses was in the mount forty days and forty nights.
korean_text: 모세는 구름 속으로 들어가서 산 위에 올랐으며 모세가 사십 일 사십 야를 산에 있으니라

sentences.original_text: And Moses went into the midst of the cloud,
and gat him up into the mount:
and Moses was in the mount
